_description: Configuration controlling scheme grouping, exclusion, variant selection, and classification. Python reads this file as rules only.
_base_scheme_remove_terms_desc: Terms removed from scheme names to identify the base scheme for grouping variants.
_exclusion_rules_desc: Schemes containing any of these keywords are excluded completely before comparison.
_selection_rules_desc: When multiple variants exist for the same base scheme, the one matching all these keywords is retained.
_type_rules_desc: Scheme classification rules based on keywords found in scheme name.
